description:
sync/atomic: FreeBSD/ARM support
only supports ARMv6K and newer ARM cores.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/

This looks reasonable to me, but I can't test it.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=32c1ce44286f ***

sync/atomic: FreeBSD/ARM support
